key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the main window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the main window.

key.name: sidebar-visible
key.description: Whether the folder sidebar is visible.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: The color scheme for the application.

key.name: default-account
key.description: The ID of the default email account.

key.name: sync-interval
key.description: How often to sync emails in minutes.

key.name: notifications-enabled
key.description: Whether to show desktop notifications for new emails.

key.name: show-message-preview
key.description: Whether to show message snippets in the message list.

key.name: notification-sound
key.description: Whether to play a sound when new emails arrive.

key.name: notification-preview-enabled
key.description: Whether to show sender and subject in notifications.

key.name: app-icon
key.description: Which icon to use for the application: custom NorthMail icon or system email icon.
